data.title: HALLELUJAH! (1929)
data.meta_description: motion picture |   Feature film (over 60 minutes).   "Waiting at the end of the road" by Irving Berlin, sung by Daniel Haynes; "Swanee shuffle" by Irving Berlin, sung by Nina Mae McKinney; "Blue Blowers blues"; "St. Louis blues" by W. C. Handy; "Sleep, little baby"; "Swing low, sweet chariot"; "Sometimes I feel like a motherless child" (trad.); "Going home"; "Grey day"; "I belong to that man". (Songs).   Nina Mae McKinney as Chick, Victoria Spivey as Missy Rose, The Dixie Jubilee Singers, Gus Cannon,  Earl Roach. (Personnel On Camera).   The Curtis Mosby Orchestra (the Kansas City Blue Blowers), with Lawrence Brown, trombone. (Soundtrack Personnel).   Motion Picture (Form).
